item.description:
If you're single, and you're looking to improve both your social life and your success with the opposite sex, then you're going to love this.

The purpose of this group is to help each other be more successful in social and business situations as well as those times when you want to attract someone new.

WHAT HAPPENS AT THE MEETINGS?

We'll discuss a variety of topics that are related to building the social life you've always wanted.

Things like:

- How to approach people and start conversations
- Direct feedback on how you can improve your personality (if you want it)
- Developing confidence in any social situation
- Body language
- How to have a great first date
- How to make a good first impression
- Establishing and building friendships
- We might help analyze someone's date (if they ask)
- Developing an active social network of quality people
- Conversation skills and techniques
- Becoming more charismatic
- Verbal self-defense and assertiveness

Whether you're just looking for new friends, or you want to attract a high quality partner, this group can help you immensely.  Go ahead and hit the big JOIN US button and join our group, and we look forward to meeting you sometime soon.
item.name: Boston Dating School
